title: Drawing, "The Rise of Rome: Head of a Man Facing Left, Scipio", 1930–32
description: In the present view of a man in left profile, dark lines and heavy shadows prevail. Shading is particularly heavy in the cheek and neck. Two furrowed lines extend downward from the forehead to the nose. Scipio, in antique Roman style capitals,  appears on the left in the space between the chin and shoulder.
